page.title: 20The Recreation Ground
page.content: The "Wreck" is the local recreation ground in Boroughbridge.It is very near to the High School,and the Leisure Centre.It has a roundabout, 2 sets of wooden swings,a see-saw, baby swings and a baby slide.At one end there is a climbing frame.There used to be a larger slide but it was taken away.The Wreck is situated between New Row and the old A.1.At the top of the Wreck there is lots of space in which you can exercise your dog.A fair comes to Boroughbridge often,it is held at the Wreck.It is the only park,but as Boroughbridge is in the middle of the countryside other parks are not really necessary.The children are also allowed to play on the school playing field.Boroughbridge also has a cricket field,a tennis club and a football club.
